title: Hour 1 - Adam Caplan (07-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Adam Caplan (07-03-20)
description:
It's a very special 4th of July Eve edition of the Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Rob Parker and Jason Smith are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys share their thoughts on the impending return of the MLB and the NBA as we enter Phase 2 of the Sports Re-Opening and explain why they're glad to see big sponsors trying to force the Washington Redskins to change their name. Plus, FOX Sports Radio NFL insider Adam Caplan stops by to share his thoughts on the impending Redskins name change and discuss the social media rumor that Antonio Brown could be headed to the Texans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
It's a very special 4th of July Eve edition of the Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Rob Parker and Jason Smith are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys share their thoughts on the impending return of the MLB and the NBA as we enter Phase 2 of the Sports Re-Opening and explain why they're glad to see big sponsors trying to force the Washington Redskins to change their name. Plus, FOX Sports Radio NFL insider Adam Caplan stops by to share his thoughts on the impending Redskins name change and discuss the social media rumor that Antonio Brown could be headed to the Texans.
